This commercial was posted to Reddit with the title “Amazing commercial you cannot stop watching”. I think it sucks.

It would be silly to uproot your life to lead an uprising against logging companies in Nicaragua, wouldn’t it!? Yeah! Well, just buy these products and you don’t need to feel guilty about not doing something you shouldn’t do anyway. Ahh, a clear and at peace conscience.

It’s the equivalent of telling an obese person they’re never going to exercise six hours a day, that’s crazy, just drink these weight loss chocolate bars.

Yes quitting your job and moving to the jungle is dumb and would be ineffectual but buying a Mars Bar with a special logo on it doesn’t absolve you of all accountability. A certain level of guilt is good. It forces you to be conscious of an issue in all parts of your life.

I don’t like anything that sells itself as a golden bullet to any significantly large problem. Especially when the golden bullet is buying stuff.
